Name: PunchBots
About the game: PunchBots is a game for up to 4 players. Compete with your friends while you play on the couch or practice against bots. You can play with a keyboard and controller is easy to learn like no other game. Among the main features are: 6 different areas to choose from where you can face your friends with a total of 18 different arenas. Different power ups that you will find during the gameplay (rocket fists, extra speed, double fists, others) The possibility of adding bots to complete the fights A test area to learn the basic controls and power ups of the game. Follow us in our Discord community for news and development progress.
